amendment.description: Amendment requires the Comptroller General to submit a report to Congress detailing the costs associated with the renovation of two U.N. buildings in Geneva, Switzerland.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in subpart A of Part 1 of House Report 109-132 to require the Comptroller General to submit a report to Congress describing the costs associated with the contracting for and construction of the Geneva, Switzerland, buildings of the World Meteorological Organization (WMO) and the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
